comments.comment: Aniwarenma oya dewal issarahata geniyanna ona. Oyawage sampath eda idala innawa ee ayagen wadak lankawata karaganna lankawe palakayo dabne na. Un danne thamange malla purawaganna withrai. Me rata godanaganna puluwan mewage inna sampath walin wadak ganna ona. Ekata inna ona ratata adare karana rata godanaganna ona kiyala hithana palakayek. Obata subapathanawa oka digatama karagena yanna. Oya kelinma janadipathiwa hambawenna oya eka eka hambenne nathuwa. Wena diunuwena ratawal diunuwenne oyawage ayagen wadak aragena ewata rajya anugrahaya dena nisa thamai.

comments.comment: Aththatama watinawa deiyane me wage sampath ape rate inna eka saha dayadayan me dewal. Me dewal wala predanama varada thiyenne deshapaluwange wahal bawaya saha salli, mila, mudal saha comiss walata ethi tanhawa saha para suddanta gethi kam karala ha karana purudda nisai me dewal walata thenak denne neththe. Meka munge puruddak. Purudu ath harinna be pita ratawal walinma me dewal genwanna hadanne anunta atha pa nayata higana purudu nisai. Ithin kiyanawa mun lankawama nayai pita ratawal walata. Pita rata mal wala sakura mal wala, bildin wala, ehema lassana kiyanawa saha vidinawa lagama thiyena lankawe perani gewal pansal jathika urumayan lakawe pipena saman mal wage dewal agayanne ne kochchara gunaida. Waththe ho idame kohe hari gahak thibbath palathama suwadai udeta. Issara api reta pohottu aran vathure dala udeta munath hodanawa as penimata gunayak thiyena nisa. Ithin ratata hari yaida. Pita rata thiyena dewal hadunwa denawa lassana lassana kanata mihiri katha gothala janathawa gonata andanawa pita rata visthara kiyala. Dura ethaka nethiwa etherin eha thiyena dewal hoyanawa lagama thiyena saha pipena kekulu gena nehuna wage innawa. Rewatenne kawuda???  Pettral wenuwata wathuren wahana duwanna vidyo ekak man dekka kohewath nemei me lankawema thawath kenek. Iti ura walin wahana duwanna hoyagena thiyenawa me painas walin. Me dewal wala ekathuwak karala wardanaya karanam adu veyawemakin vedi labayak ganna puluwan me apema rate apema minis sampath thulin hari preyojanayak gaththanam.  Rata ethuli, rate minisun thulai, krusi karmaya thulai, jathiya thulai predanama sanwardanayak viya yuththe. Jaththyanthrayak adalama ne rate jeewath wena predanama jathiya wardanaya karanna. rate janatha aithin saha illim. Ape sanskruthiya. Predana ahara wela bath. Batha bulathin vardanayak. Budun wahanse minis wargayata deshana kare. "Sabbe saththa aharattithika, dwe nama kin namancha rupancha,, yanuwenui. Sema sathwayekutama predanama de. Ahara awashshi. Deka namayak saha rupayak awashshi. Apita me hema dema lankawa thulama thiyenawane. Kuburu ida kema sadaha.  Namayak sri lankawa, sinhala, sinha le. Me namata saha ratata samana thawath ratak thiyenawada. Anith bahira sampath rata thulama nirmanaya wela thiyeddith monawatada pita rata hal kannai, hema beheth wargayakma lankawema shaka anusarayenuth. Manawa sistacharaye diyunuwath samaga ethi vu Bahira awashshyatha wenuwen thamai me minis sampath thula ethi segawunu dakshath eliyata aran jaththyantharaye osawa thebima noweida gotabaya methiduni. Budu saranai...!!! Sumana saman devi pihitai...!!!
comments.author: Gihan Gihan
